{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Account Officer",
  "description": "Swift Consulting Limited - Our client, a Logistics Company is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer&nbsp;
Job Location:&nbsp;Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Ensure compliance with company policies and basic accounting standards
	Support auditors during audits when required
	Record daily financial transactions, including invoices, payments, and receipts
	Prepare and update cashbook, expense reports, and reconciliation statements
	Assist in preparing monthly financial reports
	Maintain proper documentation of all financial records
	Support the management with budget monitoring and cost control
	Track account payables and receivables
	Assist with payroll preparation


Requirements


	National Diploma (ND/OND) in Accounting or related field
	Minimum of 2 years of accounting experience is required
	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and basic accounting software
	Strong numerical and analytical skills
	Attention to detail and accuracy
	Good communication and organizational skills
	Ability to work with minimal supervision
	Experience in logistics is an added advantage.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hireme@swiftconsulting.com.ng&nbsp;using Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

  "validThrough": "2026-01-15",

Account Officer Job at Swift Consulting Limited




        
    

        
        Swift Consulting Limited - Our client, a Logistics Company is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer 
Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Ensure compliance with company policies and basic accounting standards
	Support auditors during audits when required
	Record daily financial transactions, including invoices, payments, and receipts
	Prepare and update cashbook, expense reports, and reconciliation statements
	Assist in preparing monthly financial reports
	Maintain proper documentation of all financial records
	Support the management with budget monitoring and cost control
	Track account payables and receivables
	Assist with payroll preparation


Requirements


	National Diploma (ND/OND) in Accounting or related field
	Minimum of 2 years of accounting experience is required
	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and basic accounting software
	Strong numerical and analytical skills
	Attention to detail and accuracy
	Good communication and organizational skills
	Ability to work with minimal supervision
	Experience in logistics is an added advantage.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hireme@swiftconsulting.com.ng using Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Warehouse Assistant",
  "description": "Helean Global Limited is a full-fledged Human Resource Solution Provider incorporated in Nigeria with its Head Office in Lagos, Nigeria. We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their businesses through our core services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Warehouse Assistant
Job Location:&nbsp;Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Maintain accurate records of all warehouse items, document stock movements, and generate reports to reflect warehouse performance
	Organize and optimize inventory within the storage areas to ensure proper arrangement, safety, and accessibility
	Enforce strict adherence to warehouse policies and procedures, including stock rotation practices such as FIFO
	Ensure high inventory accuracy for all SKUs under assigned sections
	Keep the warehouse clean, organized, and safe


Requirements


	Previous warehouse experience is required
	Preferably male for gender balance
	Smart, physically fit, and attentive to details
	Must live close to the job location &ndash; Surulere.


Salary
NGN120,000 Net monthly.&nbsp;

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to:&nbsp;careers@heleanglobal.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

&nbsp;",
  "datePosted": "2026-01-02",
  "validThrough": "2026-01-14",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Helean Global Limited"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",

      "addressCountry": "NG"

  },

    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",

      "minValue": 75000,
      "maxValue": 150000,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Warehouse Assistant Job at Helean Global Limited




        
    

        
        Helean Global Limited is a full-fledged Human Resource Solution Provider incorporated in Nigeria with its Head Office in Lagos, Nigeria. We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their businesses through our core services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Warehouse Assistant
Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Maintain accurate records of all warehouse items, document stock movements, and generate reports to reflect warehouse performance
	Organize and optimize inventory within the storage areas to ensure proper arrangement, safety, and accessibility
	Enforce strict adherence to warehouse policies and procedures, including stock rotation practices such as FIFO
	Ensure high inventory accuracy for all SKUs under assigned sections
	Keep the warehouse clean, organized, and safe


Requirements


	Previous warehouse experience is required
	Preferably male for gender balance
	Smart, physically fit, and attentive to details
	Must live close to the job location – Surulere.


Salary
NGN120,000 Net monthly. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: careers@heleanglobal.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

     

    

        Click here to Apply
